node.text: First of all good morning, my name is Lapis. And I am a water spirit.

choice.option: I need the pendant that Bill gave you.
Shut up and give me the pendant.

node.text: Yes, here you go, I thought he had given it to me.
Okay sorry, here you go, you don't have to be so aggressive.
You look strong, do you want us to work toghether? Is it necessary to have at least 2 playable characters… And if you refuse me you might get bad qualifications.

choice.option: Fine, we can unite our forces.
I do not care, I still can go to revaluation.

node.text: Lets go! We will be very good friends from now.
Oh, okay. See you on september I guess.
Ah, adventurer! I'm glad you're here. I have a wedding and I need my pendant that Lapis has it, find him, he will give you my pendant and bring it back to me please!

choice.option: Okay, that sounds easy! I'll finish it in no time.
Hmm, I'm not sure if I'm ready for that.

node.text: Excellent! I knew I could rely on you.
No problem, adventurer. Come again when you are prepared for this task and I will have a reward waiting for you.
Ah, adventurer, thank you for coming. It's been weighing on my heart, but I've lost my late wife's precious necklace. I believe it might have fallen into the lake. Can you help me find it?

choice.option: I'll search the lake and do my best to find the necklace for you.
Is there any other thing that I need to know?

node.text: Thank you, kind soul. I'm grateful for your willingness to help. The lake can be tricky, so please be cautious.
There are rumors that there is a powerful creature gathering precious stones in the lake, maybe the necklace is on its treasure.

Greetings, adventurer! I'm relieved you're here. During my research trip, I misplaced four crucial manuscripts that contain vital information about the origin of this island. I need your help to find them so that we can create a comprehensive book on our island's history. Will you undertake this important quest?

choice.option: Count on me! I'll help you find those manuscripts.
Can you provide any hints or information to narrow down the search areas?

node.text: Thank you, adventurer! Your dedication to uncovering our island's history is commendable. The manuscripts could be anywhere, so search thoroughly. Once you've collected all four, bring them back to me, and I'll reward you generously.

I understand it's a challenging endeavor. Let me give you a clue: Each manuscript is hidden in a significant landmark of our island. Explore the ruins, the cave system, the forest, and the lake. Good luck! Return to me with all the manuscripts and I will reward you generously.
Thank you for helping me gather all the manuscripts! Here is your reward.
Thank you for returning my wife’s necklace! Here is your reward.
Thank you for giving me my pendant, I owe you one!
